remarks: Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version).  Frequently-used variant of ~ rexlimdv .  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
rexlimdv3a.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
rexlimdv3a $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x e. A ps -> ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
